question: Luna enchanted a spell using <sup>12</sup>⁄<sub>18</sub> of her magic power. What is this fraction simplified to?
Luna discovered that <sup>16</sup>⁄<sub>24</sub> of a rare herb. What is this fraction reduced to?
Merlin cast a spell using <sup>24</sup>⁄<sub>36</sub> of his magic. What is this fraction simplified to?
Merlin and Luna brewed a healing potion using <sup>14</sup>⁄<sub>21</sub> of their magic herbs. What is this fraction reduced to?
Luna enchanted a shield using <sup>65</sup>⁄<sub>70</sub> of her power. What is this fraction simplified to?
Merlin mixed <sup>32</sup>⁄<sub>48</sub> of a potion. What is this fraction reduced to?
Merlin and Luna simplified <sup>120</sup>⁄<sub>130</sub> to its lowest terms. What is the simplified form?
Merlin and Luna brewed a potion using <sup>70</sup>⁄<sub>90</sub> of their magical ingredients. What is the simplified fraction of the potion's power?
Merlin mixed <sup>2</sup>⁄<sub>3</sub> of a potion with <sup>4</sup>⁄<sub>5</sub> of another. What is the result of multiplying these fractions?

Merlin and Luna decided to brew a powerful potion using their newfound knowledge of fractions. They needed to mix <sup>4</sup>⁄<sub>3</sub> of a rare elixir with <sup>3</sup>⁄<sub>5</sub> of a mystical essence. Find what simplified fraction of the total mixture did they use?

Merlin and Luna are preparing another potion. They decided to mix <sup>3</sup>⁄<sub>5</sub> of unicorn hair with <sup>7</sup>⁄<sub>9</sub> of centaur tears. What fraction will they get on multiplying both potions?
What is <sup>7</sup>⁄<sub>9</sub> times <sup>3</sup>⁄<sub>4</sub>, a multiplication problem Merlin and Luna tackled?
Luna created a charm using <sup>3</sup>⁄<sub>7</sub> of a starlight essence and <sup>6</sup>⁄<sub>11</sub> of a moonbeam essence. What fraction of the charm's power does this represent?

Merlin and Luna needed to enhance their potion's effectiveness. They decided to multiply <sup>3</sup>⁄<sub>7</sub> of dragon scales with <sup>4</sup>⁄<sub>5</sub> of unicorn hair. What fraction of the total mixture does this represent?
Luna enchanted a shield using <sup>5</sup>⁄<sub>6</sub> of her magic energy and <sup>4</sup>⁄<sub>9</sub> of her elemental power. What is the resulting fraction of the enchanted shield's strength?
What is <sup>3</sup>⁄<sub>4</sub> times <sup>6</sup>⁄<sub>5</sub>, a spell Merlin and Luna mastered?
What is <sup>15</sup>⁄<sub>25</sub> times <sup>20</sup>⁄<sub>25</sub>, a multiplication challenge faced by Merlin and Luna?
Merlin and Luna simplified <sup>82</sup>⁄<sub>98</sub> to its lowest terms. What is the simplified form?
What is <sup>13</sup>⁄<sub>11</sub> times <sup>12</sup>⁄<sub>15</sub>, a fraction product that Merlin and Luna calculated?
What is the product of <sup>11</sup>⁄<sub>19</sub> and <sup>15</sup>⁄<sub>10</sub>, as calculated by Merlin and Luna?
